name: test_minting_and_burning_witnesses[build-asset_name]
description:
Test minting and burning of tokens, sign the transaction using witnesses.

        * mint 2 tokens - one identified by policyid + asset name
          and one identified by just policyid
        * burn the minted tokens
        * check fees in Lovelace
        * check output of the `transaction view` command
        * (optional) check transactions in db-sync
descriptionHtml:
Test minting and burning of tokens, sign the transaction using witnesses.

    * mint 2 tokens - one identified by policyid + asset name
      and one identified by just policyid
    * burn the minted tokens
    * check fees in Lovelace
    * check output of the `transaction view` command
    * (optional) check transactions in db-sync

labels.name: tag
labels.value: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='cannot use `build` with cluster era 'alonzo' and TX era 'alonzo'')

tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='cannot use `build` with cluster era 'alonzo' and TX era 'alonzo'')
